doc:
Benjamin Whitrow https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benjamin_Whitrow 0 Benjamin John Whitrow (17 February 1937 – 28 September 2017) was an English actor. He was nominated for the BAFTA TV Award for Best Actor for his role as Mr Bennet in the 1995 BBC version of Pride and Prejudice, and voiced the role of Fowler in the 2000 animated film Chicken Run. His other film appearances include Quadrophenia (1979), Personal Services (1987) and Bomber (2009). Benjamin_John_Whitrow ( 17_February_1937 – 28_September_2017 ) was an_English_actor . He was_nominated for the_BAFTA_TV_Award for Best_Actor for his_role as Mr_Bennet in the_1995_BBC_version of Pride_and_Prejudice , and voiced the_role of Fowler in the_2000_animated_film_Chicken_Run . His_other_film_appearances include Quadrophenia_(_1979_) , Personal_Services_(_1987_)_and_Bomber_(_2009_) .
